title: Scaling of a midsized patented low energy, light weight, highly efficient actuator to meet the demands of smaller and larger scale functions
objective:
The Smart Actuator Company Ltd develops smart, RIFT DrivenÆ actuators our first was delivered to market in Q3-2013.  The system is proven to use 25% less copper, be 80% lighter and 75% more energy efficient than our competitors.  Early success means that the first two years production scheduling is already sold to 90% capacity and The Smart Actuator Company now own global rights for the use of RIFT Technology in electrically powered actuators.  Put simply, we believe our technology is a game changing product capable of delivering benefits worldwide by dramatically reducing;
ï energy required to automate everyday tasks in many applications
ï volume of raw materials, including copper and magnets, used to    manufacture automated systems
ï inventory and therefore administration complexity
ï weight, thereby reducing fuel use in logistics and shipping
ï Carbon Footprint in manufacturing and distribution
ï need for sourcing manufacturing capability outside Europe
